contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
This Court having assumed plenary jurisdiction of these matters by Order dated October 9, 1986, and it appearing after argument and review that no underlying case or controversy is pending in the courts of this Commonwealth, the Order of the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia, Trial Division, Criminal Section, entered July 22, 1986, at Misc. No. 789-13757, C-6, is hereby vacated.
